meanings: 실용회화-애정표현 Thoughts of you make me smile.

vlive.korean: 떡이 원래 떠올라요? Are rice cakes supposed to float? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
vlive.english: Are rice cakes supposed to float?

vlive.korean: 너도 떠올라? Does he come to mind, too? 듣기 View video KBS예능 : 세븐틴 에스쿱스&승관 <안녕하세요> 대기실 vlive!
vlive.english: Does he come to mind, too?

vlive.korean: 그럼 캠핑하면 뭐가 떠올라요? What do you think of when you hear camping? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.16 MBTI of SVT #3
vlive.english: What do you think of when you hear camping?

vlive.korean: [낚임] 그러면 캠핑 하면 뭐 떠올라요? [Falls for it] What do you think of when you hear camping? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.16 MBTI of SVT #3
vlive.english: [Falls for it] What do you think of when you hear camping?

vlive.korean: 할로윈 파티 음식하면 뭐가 가장 떠올라요? What comes to mind when you think of a Halloween party? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] NU'EST X LieV - 뉴이스트의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: What comes to mind when you think of a Halloween party?

examples.korean: We watched the balloon riding high above the fields. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 풍선이 들판 위로 높이 떠올라 가는 것을 바라보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We watched the balloon riding high above the fields. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As her ideas flowed easily, all her distractions faded. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 좋은 생각이 계속 머리에 떠올라 그녀는 그 외의 다른 일들은 모두 잊고 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: As her ideas flowed easily, all her distractions faded. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Thoughts of you make me smile. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신을 생각하면 미소가 떠올라요. Neungyule
examples.english: Thoughts of you make me smile. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It has painful associations for me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그걸 보면 아픈 기억이 떠올라요. Neungyule
examples.english: It has painful associations for me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It brings back painful memories. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그걸 보면 가슴 아픈 기억이 떠올라요. Neungyule
examples.english: It brings back painful memories. Add to Wordbook
